resources.string: Secondary Text (eg. description - bla bla bla bla bla bla bla bla)
Endless entertainment of your favourite animals. Stream videos of cute kittens, silly house pets, drunk monkeys, screaming goats, and more!
See what the world is watching â€” from the hottest music videos to what\'s trending in gaming, entertainment, news... you name it!
World\'s most anticipated strategy game on Android of 2015, Conflict of Clubs calls to all strategists to build your club to conquer others in a global real time battle royale.
Video calling and conferencing has never been so easy, fluid, and affordable. Talk@Me connects you to friends and family with cutting edge HD audio and video streaming.
Pic Me! is a simple way to capture and share the world\'s moments. Transform your everyday photos and videos into digital memories you can upload to show your friends, family and followers.
With a sleek and minimalistic design, Picture Post is a photo blog app that lets you organize and share photo collections in a growing community of photo lovers.
Rate your friends and family on a five meow scale. 5s have lives, 4s have chores, 3s have fleas, 2s have ooze, and 1s have tons.
Help these Bitter Butterflies to exact revenge on the laughing mad cows that ruined their livelihood.
Hearable gives you the power of streaming or downloading audio entertainment, information and educational programming right onto your mobile device.
Endorsed by the MIT Department of Mathematics, MATHs gives you easy tools, fun tutorials, and robust resources to help you learn more in any domain of mathematics study.
Feeling crafty? Get Crafty! Enter a world of handy arts and crafts with unlimited art activities shared by peers from all over the world.
So simple, yet so powerful. Drawr allows you to draw and design graphics with a multitude of tools from a simple user-interface that maximizes your device\'s screen real estate.
Feel one IQ point smarter everyday - get fun facts, trivia, and articles related to all kinds of subjects or event.
Become a powerful computer programming wizard with CodeWiz - a tool developed by genius group CodeWizard that will bestow upon you the magic secrets of programming.
JED brings communities together from all around the world to engage people in the most amusing, intriguing and thought provoking presentations.
Ten minutes too long - 5 minutes too short. Start your 7 minute workout with this app and make the best of exercise between your work breaks.
Rest and take it easy with these quality music lessons crafted from music entusiasts, composers and instructors world wide.
